mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_compo_time_day (year, month, day, appkey, componentkey, date, dayofweek, zero_session, one_session, two_session, three_session, four_session, five_session, six_session, seven_session, eight_session, nine_session, ten_session, eleven_session, twelve_session, thirteen_session, fourteen_session, fifteen_session, sixteen_session, seventeen_session, eighteen_session, nineteen_session, twenty_session, twentyone_session, twentytwo_session, twentythree_session) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{appkey}, #{componentkey}, #{date}, #{dayofweek}, #{zero_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{one_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{two_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{four_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{five_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{six_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seven_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eight_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nine_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eleven_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twelve_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fourteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fifteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sixteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seventeen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eighteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nineteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twenty_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentyone_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentytwo_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentythree_session,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO cp_compo_time_week (year, week, appkey, componentkey, fromdate, todate, zero_session, one_session, two_session, three_session, four_session, five_session, six_session, seven_session, eight_session, nine_session, ten_session, eleven_session, twelve_session, thirteen_session, fourteen_session, fifteen_session, sixteen_session, seventeen_session, eighteen_session, nineteen_session, twenty_session, twentyone_session, twentytwo_session, twentythree_session) VALUES (#{year}, #{week}, #{appkey}, #{componentkey}, #{fromdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{todate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{zero_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{one_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{two_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{four_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{five_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{six_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seven_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eight_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nine_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eleven_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twelve_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fourteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fifteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sixteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seventeen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eighteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nineteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twenty_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentyone_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentytwo_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentythree_session,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO cp_compo_time_month (year, month, appkey, componentkey, zero_session, one_session, two_session, three_session, four_session, five_session, six_session, seven_session, eight_session, nine_session, ten_session, eleven_session, twelve_session, thirteen_session, fourteen_session, fifteen_session, sixteen_session, seventeen_session, eighteen_session, nineteen_session, twenty_session, twentyone_session, twentytwo_session, twentythree_session) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{appkey}, #{componentkey}, #{zero_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{one_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{two_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{four_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{five_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{six_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seven_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eight_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nine_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eleven_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twelve_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fourteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fifteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sixteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seventeen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eighteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nineteen_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twenty_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentyone_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentytwo_session,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twentythree_session,jdbcType=BIGINT})
